subject: Hockey, Ice
NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
lead_paragraph: Shawn Hunwick stopped 40 shots as the Wolverines surprised the top-seeded Sioux to advance to the N.C.A.A. title game against Minnesota-Duluth, which edged Notre Dame.
snippet: Shawn Hunwick stopped 40 shots as the Wolverines surprised the top-seeded Sioux to advance to the N.C.A.A. title game against Minnesota-Duluth, which edged Notre Dame.
